content: Added offline `service worker` to project `Krugurt` (https://tinyurl.com/wyv8nym). Make your website or web apps running without the internet connection. Isn't that beautiful?
Project `Golem GUI AppStore` (https://tinyurl.com/udvgz37) has been pending for a year, it's time to continue to work on what is left. But I decided to revamp it with `Krugurt` toolkit.
Working on the new `noozy` version `4`, an audiophile grade music player for the latest Android. A 12 types of sound processors and advanced sound modeling options in the design.

`kraft` prototype 3.x giving artist the superpower to produce UI components without knowing how to code, Kraft has it all, when you creating or organizing objects, it generates CSS code real-time, you just need to export it.

Made another version of `Playmemories` for desktop (Linux) (https://bit.ly/2HLr2In). It can manipulates the Sony Cybershot LensStyle Camera device remotely and Auto-Focusing with a mouse-click on the shoot area. Video recording and zoom control. The binary version (https://bit.ly/2HxCpTZ).

`Equilibrium`, (https://tinyurl.com/qo4c9ml) a lightweight backup utility for Linux Terminal. Now with a brand new CLI for easy editing setttings and adding exclusion for files or folders that you don't want.
`Yogurt, CandyBar` prototype and the example. This tool crafts beautiful GPU Accelerated UI without user to learn CSS and write CSS code.
New `golem` (https://tinyurl.com/svmzfgk) updates for both CLI (v2.0.21) and SDK (v2.0.47). You can now upgrading all the installed apps with a single command in Terminal.
